title: Understanding Pharmacokinetic Principles for Therapeutic Drug Monitoring (TDM)

context.additional_context: Targets intermediate-level professionals with job experience in interpreting laboratory analysis results

learning_goals: Learners can explain the definition and clinical necessity of Therapeutic Drug Monitoring (TDM) in at least three ways.
Learners can apply key pharmacokinetic parameters—such as half-life, clearance rate, and volume of distribution—in practical settings.
Learners can solve over 80% of calculation problems predicting therapeutic effects by interpreting drug concentration-time curves.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
